QuestData.Title: Where a Soul Belongs
QuestData.Description:
This soul is no longer tethered to his world of Azeroth.
Kleia must perform her duty and bear him to Oribos to be judged by the Arbiter.
Take this vesper. When you are ready, it will call Ascended to ferry you back across the Veil to Oribos.
Go in service.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Vesper of Veilflight to travel to Oribos, then witness Ben Howell's judgment.
